name: Quoffi
description:
QUOFFI

  Quoffi is a cafe simulation where you're tasked to serve as many drinks to customers in a limited time! Lets see if you can maintain the piccadilly cafes reputation in a fight to make as many customers happy! 

How many drinks can YOU make?

All assets have been made during the jam, apart from the audio. 

Members:

  • William Hardy | Programmer (My back is broken)
  • Liam Waters | Artist and Enviroment
  • Joe Gronow | 2D Artist
  • Lauren Taylor | UI / 3D Artist
